reviewText: This provacative film traces the origin and evolution of boxing over 600 years from the ancient Mediterranean to bare-knuckle boxing in 17th and 18th century England to 20th century boxing in the United States. It includes probing interviews with former world champions Marvelous Marvin Hagler, Jake La Motta, and Ingemar Johansson exploring why people box and what makes the sport so exciting and entertaining to watch.
